titles.title: Countering Limitless Overtaking of User Data Act
Countering Limitless Overtaking of User Data Act
To require the Secretary of Commerce to submit a report to Congress on data servicing operations owned by Chinese entities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Countering Limitless Overtaking of User Data Act or the CLOUD Act This bill requires the Department of Commerce to report on data servicing operations owned by Chinese entities. The report must address, for example, whether these Chinese entities may be subsidized by China.
